panels.description: Counts the increase in document additions over the specified interval.

targets.expr: avg by(job, base_url, collection, core) (increase(solr_metrics_core_update_handler_adds_total{job=~"$job", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", base_url=~"$base_url", collection=~"$solr_collection", core=~"$solr_core"}[$__interval:])) > 0

panels.title: Update handlers / $__interval

panels.description: Measures the average rate of queries per second over a 5-minute period for core search and retrieval operations.

targets.expr: avg by(searchHandler, job, base_url, collection, core) (solr_metrics_core_query_5minRate{job=~"$job", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", base_url=~"$base_url", collection=~"$solr_collection", core=~"$solr_core", searchHandler=~"/select|/query|/get",}) > 0

panels.title: Core search and retrieval query load

panels.description: Measures the average rate of specialized queries per second over a 5-minute period.

targets.expr: avg by(searchHandler, job, base_url, collection, core) (solr_metrics_core_query_5minRate{job=~"$job", base_url=~"$base_url", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", searchHandler=~"/sql|/export|/stream", collection=~"$solr_collection", core=~"$solr_core",}) > 0

panels.title: Specialized query load

panels.description: Represents the 95th percentile latency for core search and retrieval queries.

targets.expr: avg by(searchHandler, job, base_url, collection, core) (solr_metrics_core_query_p95_ms{job=~"$job", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", base_url=~"$base_url", collection=~"$solr_collection", core=~"$solr_core", searchHandler=~"/select|/query|/get",}) > 0

panels.title: Core search and retrieval 95p query latency

panels.description: Displays the 993ith percentile latency for specialized query types.

targets.expr: avg by(searchHandler, job, base_url, collection, core) (solr_metrics_core_query_p95_ms{job=~"$job", base_url=~"$base_url", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", searchHandler=~"/sql|/export|/stream", collection=~"$solr_collection", core=~"$solr_core",}) > 0

panels.title: Specialized 95p query latency

panels.description: Represents the 99th percentile latency for core search and retrieval queries, measured in milliseconds.

targets.expr: avg by(searchHandler, job, base_url, collection, core) (solr_metrics_core_query_p99_ms{job=~"$job", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", base_url=~"$base_url", collection=~"$solr_collection", core=~"$solr_core", searchHandler=~"/select|/query|/get",}) > 0

panels.title: Core search and retrieval 99p query latency

panels.description: Displays the 99th percentile latency for specialized query types.

targets.expr: avg by(searchHandler, job, base_url, collection, core) (solr_metrics_core_query_p99_ms{job=~"$job", base_url=~"$base_url", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", searchHandler=~"/sql|/export|/stream", collection=~"$solr_collection", core=~"$solr_core",}) > 0

panels.title: Specialized 99p query latency

panels.description: Indicates the average rate of local queries per second over a 5-minute period for core search and retrieval operations.

targets.expr: avg by(searchHandler, job, base_url, collection, core) (solr_metrics_core_query_local_5minRate{job=~"$job", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", base_url=~"$base_url", collection=~"$solr_collection", core=~"$solr_core", searchHandler=~"/select|/query|/get",}) > 0

panels.title: Core search and retrieval local query load

panels.description: Indicates the average rate of local specialized queries per second over a 5-minute period.

targets.expr: avg by(searchHandler, job, base_url, collection, core) (solr_metrics_core_query_local_5minRate{job=~"$job", base_url=~"$base_url", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", searchHandler=~"/sql|/export|/stream", collection=~"$solr_collection", core=~"$solr_core",}) > 0

panels.title: Specialized local query load

panels.description: Represents the 95th percentile latency for local core search and retrieval queries.

targets.expr: avg by(searchHandler, job, base_url, collection, core) (solr_metrics_core_query_local_p95_ms{job=~"$job", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", base_url=~"$base_url", collection=~"$solr_collection", core=~"$solr_core", searchHandler=~"/select|/query|/get",}) > 0

panels.title: Core search and retrieval local p95 query latency

panels.description: Shows the 95th percentile latency for specialized local queries.

targets.expr: avg by(searchHandler, job, base_url, collection, core) (solr_metrics_core_query_local_p95_ms{job=~"$job", base_url=~"$base_url", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", searchHandler=~"/sql|/export|/stream", collection=~"$solr_collection", core=~"$solr_core",}) > 0

panels.title: Specialized local 95p query latency

panels.description: Represents the 99th percentile latency for local core search and retrieval queries.

targets.expr: avg by(searchHandler, job, base_url, collection, core) (solr_metrics_core_query_local_p99_ms{job=~"$job", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", base_url=~"$base_url", collection=~"$solr_collection", core=~"$solr_core", searchHandler=~"/select|/query|/get",}) > 0

panels.title: Core search and retrieval 99p local query latency

targets.expr: avg by(searchHandler, job, base_url, collection, core) (solr_metrics_core_query_local_p99_ms{job=~"$job", base_url=~"$base_url", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", searchHandler=~"/sql|/export|/stream", collection=~"$solr_collection", core=~"$solr_core",}) > 0

panels.title: Specialized local 99p query latency

panels.description: Tracks the number of cache evictions.

targets.expr: avg by(type, job, base_url, collection, core) (increase(solr_metrics_core_searcher_cache{job=~"$job", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", base_url=~"$base_url", collection=~"$solr_collection", core=~"$solr_core", type=~"documentCache|filterCache|queryResultCache", item=~"evictions"}[$__interval:])) > 0

panels.title: Cache evictions / $__interval

panels.description: The cache hit ratio for various cache activities.

targets.expr: avg by(type, job, base_url, collection, core) (100 * solr_metrics_core_searcher_cache_ratio{job=~"$job", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", base_url=~"$base_url", collection=~"$solr_collection", core=~"$solr_core", type=~"documentCache|filterCache|queryResultCache"}) > 0

panels.title: Cache hit ratio

panels.description: Tracks the increase in the number of query timeouts over the specified time interval.

targets.expr: avg by(job, base_url, collection, core) (increase(solr_metrics_core_timeouts_total{job=~"$job", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", base_url=~"$base_url", collection=~"$solr_collection", core=~"$solr_core"}[$__interval:]))

panels.title: Core timeouts / $__interval

panels.description: Tracks the increase in node-level query timeouts over the specified interval.
panels.title: Node timeouts / $__interval

panels.description: Measures the rate of query errors over a 1-minute period.

targets.expr: avg by(job, base_url, collection, core) (solr_metrics_core_query_errors_1minRate{job=~"$job", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", base_url=~"$base_url", collection=~"$solr_collection", core=~"$solr_core"})

panels.title: Query error rate

panels.description: This metric represents the rate of client errors over a 1-minute period.

targets.expr: avg by(job, base_url, collection, core) (solr_metrics_core_query_client_errors_1minRate{job=~"$job", solr_cluster=~"$solr_cluster", base_url=~"$base_url", collection=~"$solr_collection", core=~"$solr_core"})

panels.title: Query client errors
